text: Bigender is a gender identity which can be literally translated as 'two genders' or 'double gender'. Bigender people experience multiple, usually two gender identities, either simultaneously or varying between them. These gender identities could be man and woman, but could also include non-binary identities. == Flags == File:Bigender Flag.svg|First bigender flag File:Bigender alternative flag.png|Another flag File:Bigender alternate flag.png|Alternate flag File:Early Intersex Flag.svg|Bigender/intersex flag == References == Category:Non-binary gender
title: Bigender
